text: Om Prakash Sharma (Nepali: ओम प्रकाश शर्मा) is a Nepali politician of Nepali Congress and Minister for Energy and Drinking water since 9 June 2021. He is also serving as member of the Madhesh Province Provincial Assembly. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Om Prakash Sharma (Nepali politician)
